title: Various Data Analysis Problems
description: Work with dictionaries and CSV data, use comprehensions of lists, sets, and dictionaries, explore the Collections module, and tackle a data analysis challenge with Chicago Transit Authority data in Python.

meta.title: Various Data Analysis Problems

meta.keywords: Python, data analysis, dictionaries, comprehensions, Collections module
